The value of $31!$ is calculated using the factorial formula as $31 \times 30 \times 29 \times \dotsm \times 3 \times 2 \times 1 = 115796093509460000000000000$. The answer is $115796093509460000000000000$.

direct_answer.text: Using Hint 1, the binomial coefficient ${31}\choose {28}$ is equal to $\dfrac{31!}{28!(31-28)!}=\dfrac{31!}{28! \cdot 3!}=\dfrac{115796093509460000000000000}{5112000000000000000000000000000}$. However, since the answer must be a whole number, this calculation does not provide a valid answer. The binomial coefficient ${31}\choose {28}$ does not exist as a whole number because it requires taking the factorial of a negative number.
